title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and/or block printed on plain weave; highly glazed
description: Three samples, same design, different colors. A) Grey ground, probably printed by "Molette," in minute geometric patterns with areas of foliage in grey, with white flowers; floral pattern of rose clusters printed over ground, probably by block. B) Green ground, roses red-violet. C) Grey ground, flowers blue with grey foliage. Highly glazed

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and/or block printed on plain weave; highly glazed. 1967-10-3-b.
